data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India.
Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 4,143,500 people living in Muzaffarnagar.
Lord, remember the Rajput (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Rajput (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, guide the church in Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Muzaffarnagar that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Muzaffarnagar, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 4,143,500.

We estimate Muzaffarnagar has 45,579 people who might know Jesus, 50,274 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,047,647 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Muzaffarnagar to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
